title: SPA pH+
long_description: SPA pH + raises pH. SPA pH + helps to keep pH levels balanced. Its concentrated gel formula is specifically designed for spas. The odourless gel dissolves quickly in hot water for rapid results, with no residue to affect bather comfort.
short_description: BENEFITS Fast-acting concentrated gel formula Improves bather comfort FORMAT 900 mL

characteristics.title: Recommended levels
characteristics.text: Maintain recommended daily levels as determined by testing kit: pH: 7.2 – 7.8 Total alkalinity: 80 – 120 ppm

characteristics.title: Application method
characteristics.text: Pour SPA pH + directly over the surface of the spa water.

characteristics.title: Instructions
characteristics.text: Add SPA pH + according to the application method and recommended dosage. Wait 15 minutes and retest pH. Repeat treatment until recommended levels are reached. Wait 10 minutes before bathing.

dosage.specifications: When pH levels are below 7.2: Add 20 mL of SPA pH + per 1,000 L of spa water to increase pH by approximately 0.4.

warning: Spa must be running before adding SPA pH +. DO NOT apply the product when people are in the spa.
